title: Define the project scope and requirements
description: Document the specific goals of assistantAnimauxIA, the animals it will focus on, and the key features it should have.

title: Design the AI model architecture
description: Create a plan for building an AI model capable of monitoring animal behavior and health in real-time.
dependencies: Define the project scope and requirements

title: Develop the frontend for data input and visualization
description: Design and build an intuitive interface for users to input data about their animals and view relevant insights.
dependencies: Define the project scope and requirements

title: Develop the backend for real-time data processing
description: Create a robust backend system that can handle real-time data from various sensors and apply machine learning algorithms.

title: Establish a database structure for animal data and insights
description: Create an efficient and scalable database schema to store, retrieve, and analyze animal data.
dependencies: Develop the backend for real-time data processing

title: Implement necessary security measures
description: Ensure the application adheres to best practices in data protection and privacy.
dependencies: Develop the frontend for data input and visualization

title: Conduct system testing and integration
description: Verify that all components of assistantAnimauxIA function as intended when integrated together.
dependencies: Develop the frontend for data input and visualization
Develop the backend for real-time data processing
